definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: I bought some "Longjing Tea" yesterday, why don't you have some?
sentences.chinese: 我昨天刚买了些龙井茶，你尝尝看。

sentences.english: They saw Longjing tea is pure and fragrant and has a sweetish and mellow taste.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为龙井茶色泽翠绿，香气馥郁，甘醇爽口。

sentences.english: Longjing tea, also known as Dragon Well tea, is a famous variety of green tea grown in Hangzhou in Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 龙井茶是指浙江杭州出产的系列绿茶。

sentences.english: The Longjing tea is one of China's best green teas. It has been a favourite among wealthy buyers.
sentences.chinese: 龙井茶是中国最好的绿茶之一，是富有买家的宠儿。

sentences.english: BIt's a special green tea named Longjing Tea from Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种特殊的绿茶，名叫龙井茶，来自浙江省。

sentences.english: Longjing tea is a specialty of Hangzhou.
Can you tell me something about West Lake Longjing Tea?
sentences.chinese: 你可以简单介绍一下西湖龙井茶吗？

sentences.english: Lion Peak Mountain Longjing Longjing tea in the top grade.
sentences.chinese: 狮峰山上的龙井为龙井茶中之上品。

sentences.english: It was found that Longjing tea sales problems.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现，龙井茶的销售存在很多问题。

sentences.english: The proposed method has been successfully applied for determination of the Longjing tea and Baiyan mineral water in real samples.
sentences.chinese: 并用于西湖龙井茶水与矿泉水中无机离子的分析测定。

sentences.english: B: It's a special green tea named Longjing Tea from Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种特殊的绿茶，名叫龙井茶，来自浙江省。

sentences.english: The combination of Longjing tea shoots and fresh prawns makes the dish a unique tasty treat.
sentences.chinese: 龙井茶和鲜虾的组合使得这道美食的口感非常独特。

sentences.english: It's the famous Longjing tea. I brought it with me all the way from China.
sentences.chinese: 这是有名的龙井茶，我从中国带来的。

sentences.english: Besides, the area of West Lake is the home of the famous .
sentences.chinese: 此外，西湖的周边地区是著名的龙井茶之乡。

sentences.english: Longjing tea Brewed in a red teapot has a stronger Chinese flavour.
sentences.chinese: 用紫砂茶壶沏泡龙井茶，可使其更具有中国风味。

sentences.english: Hangzhou West Lake · Longjing Tea garden is an outstanding model of the perfect combination of human and nature.
sentences.chinese: 杭州西湖及龙井茶园是人与自然完美结合的典范。

definition: biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
Longjing county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin/Lungching township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan/also Longjing tea 龍井茶|龙井茶
tea leaves gathered at springtime or the tea made from these leaves
Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
an expensive type of oolong tea
Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
variant of 單叢|单丛[Dan1 cong1]
Gong Cha, international franchise selling Taiwan-style milk tea and smoothies etc, established in Kaohsiung in 2006
